title: sadaanandha thaanDavam
sahitya:
sadAnanda tANDavam sheyyum pAdA varam tAtA jagannAthA



(sadAnanda)







anupallavi







citAkArattil arputAkAramAi oLiradAmurai teriya sudhamrtam



shoriya 



(sadAnanda)







caraNam







muttarum siddharum munivargaLum mOna mAdhavarum mAmUvargaLum



niddiraiyAdi viTTu ninaippu marappu keTTu nirvikarpattai nanru



maruvit-tani ninru 



(sadAnanda)
